description:
test: run index test by default

Running this test via "bash run" uncovered three different
bugs (4344, 4348, 4353).  We need to run it by default.

messages.text:

test: run index test by default

Running this test via "bash run" uncovered three different
bugs (4344, 4348, 4353).  We need to run it by default.
